dataTemplate.name: XXPOPOMTERM
dataTemplate.description: OD: PO POM Terms Mismatch Report

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT poh.segment1 po_number, ap.vendor_name vendor_name, ap.segment1 vendor_number, pterms.name po_terms, sterms.name supplier_site_terms FROM po_headers_all poh, ap_terms pterms, ap_suppliers ap, ap_supplier_sites_all aps, ap_terms sterms WHERE poh.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id AND poh.vendor_id = ap.vendor_id AND ap.vendor_id = aps.vendor_id AND poh.vendor_site_id = aps.vendor_site_id AND poh.terms_id = pterms.term_id AND aps.terms_id = sterms.term_id AND poh.type_lookup_code = 'STANDARD' AND poh.interface_source_code = 'NA-POINTR' AND poh.creation_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(:p_from_date,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(:p_to_date,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AND poh.terms_id <> aps.terms_id ORDER BY 1
